field.name: Default_Stylesheet
field.label: Use Default Stylesheet
field.description: Use the default stylesheet modules/mod_jem_cal/mod_jemcal15q.css

field.name: User_stylesheet
field.label: User Stylesheet
field.description: Use an alternative stylesheet e.g. modules/mod_jem_cal/mystylesheet.css

field.name: Show_Tooltips
field.label: Show Tooltips?
field.description: Choose to show tooltips on mouse rollover on calendar dates.

field.name: Show_Tooltips_Title
field.label: Show Tooltips Title?
field.description: Choose to show the tooltips title.

field.name: cal15q_tooltips_title
field.label: ToolTips Title (Singular)
field.description: Define the tooltips title (Singular)

field.name: cal15q_tooltipspl_title
field.label: ToolTips Title (Plural)
field.description: Define the tooltips title (Plural)

field.name: DisplayCat
field.label: Display Category in Tooltip?
field.description: Display the Category in the Tooltip

field.name: DisplayVenue
field.label: Display Venue in Tooltip?
field.description: Display the Venue in the Tooltip

field.name: UseJoomlaLanguage
field.label: Use Joomla Language for Days/Months?
field.description: Use the default Joomla language for Day and Month names

field.name: day_name_length
field.label: Length of the Dayname
field.description: Select if you want to display the full dayname or a short version

field.name: first_day
field.label: Start week
field.description: Start the week at sunday or monday

field.name: Year_length
field.label: Year Length
field.description: Select to show 2 or 4 letters

field.name: Month_length
field.label: Short month name?
field.description: Select if you wish to display the full month name or not.

field.name: Month_offset
field.label: Month Offset
field.description: Offset the month so enter 1 for a month ahear, -1 for a month behind etc

field.name: Time_offset
field.label: Time Offset (Hours)
field.description: Use this ONLY if you need to offset your time from the server settings

field.name: Remember
field.label: Remember?
field.description: Remember which month/year is selected on page change, no jumping back to current day.

field.name: CurrentEvents
field.label: Show Current Events
field.description: Show current events. Do not set both this and Archive events to No otherwise NO events will show

field.name: ArchivedEvents
field.label: Show Archived Events
field.description: Show archive events. Do not set both this and Current events to No otherwise NO events will show

field.name: StraightToDetails
field.label: Go Straight To Details?
field.description: Go straight to the details page when there is only one event to choose from

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

field.name: locale_override
field.label: Locale Override
field.description: Define the server locale you want the calendar to use to override the default - this can only be used if NOT using the default Joomla langauge

field.name: catid
field.label: CATEGORY ID
field.description: Category ID - Display a calendar only for the categories chosen, separate IDs with commas e.g. 1,3

field.name: venid
field.label: VENUE ID
field.description: Venue ID - Display a calendar only for the venue(s) chosen, separate IDs with commas e.g. 1,3

field.name: FixItemID
field.label: Override ItemID
field.description: Override the ItemID used when calendar link goes straight to details to a fixed menu item
